name: The Con
storyline: After being released from prison, the Con Artist finds themselves low on money and options. They're soon dragged into the sinister world of underground street fighting. As the world of crime gets harder to escape, the bodies start piling up. Can you earn enough money to climb the ranks of the underground tournaments and uncover the perpetrator behind these deaths? Or will the stakes get too high for you to wager against?
summary: Fight for the win or throw the fight to make some extra cash in this PSP fighting game.
